mapper.select: select p.name as papername,h.* from homework h left join paper p on p.id=h.paperid
mapper.update: update homework set score=#{score},state=1 where id=#{id}
update homework set evaluate=#{evaluate},proposal=#{proposal} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into homework(studentname, classname, stuid, paperid, cqanswer, cpanswer, dpanswer, jqanswer, apanswer,state) values (#{studentname},#{classname} ,#{stuid} ,#{paperid} ,#{cqanswer} ,#{cpanswer} ,#{dpanswer} ,#{jqanswer} ,#{apanswer},0);
mapper.select: select * from homework where dpanswer like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or apanswer like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
